description:
Germany suffered a "spectacular" 70% drop in electric car sales last month as the European Union faces growing calls to delay its unachievable carbon reduction targets.

The post Germany Suffers “Spectacular” 70% Drop in Electric Car Sales appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Germany Suffers “Spectacular” 70% Drop in Electric Car Sales

description:
A "Citizens Council" backed by the German Government has submitted recommendations to the Ministry of the Interior calling, among other things, for the potential criminalisation of "disinformation".

The post German “Citizens Council” Calls for Criminalisation of Disinformation appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: German “Citizens Council” Calls for Criminalisation of Disinformation

description:
David Lammy has sparked a diplomatic row after writing in a recent blog post that Azerbaijan has been able to "liberate" territory in a conflict widely regarded as an ethnic cleansing.

The post David Lammy Sparks Diplomatic Row With Blog Post Calling Ethnic Cleansing a “Liberation” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: David Lammy Sparks Diplomatic Row With Blog Post Calling Ethnic Cleansing a “Liberation”

description:
Scientific American has endorsed Kamala Harris for President, arguing her policies are based on "reality", "science" and "solid evidence". What about the naturalistic fallacy? How can science tell us how we ought to vote?

The post Why ‘the Science’ Doesn’t Dictate That You Should Vote For Kamala Harris appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why ‘the Science’ Doesn’t Dictate That You Should Vote For Kamala Harris

description:
A free speech group has said it was kicked out of a Brighton pub after saying children should not be taught trans ideology in schools.

The post Free Speech Group Kicked Out of Brighton Pub After Saying Children Shouldn’t Be Taught Trans Ideology appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Free Speech Group Kicked Out of Brighton Pub After Saying Children Shouldn’t Be Taught Trans Ideology

description:
Earlier this week, David Lammy said climate change was a bigger threat to our security than terrorism or war. Nonsense, says Ben Pile. The greatest threat to our security is climate policy.

The post Climate Change Isn’t the Greatest Threat to Mankind, David Lammy. The Biggest Threat to our Security is Climate Policy appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Climate Change Isn’t the Greatest Threat to Mankind, David Lammy. The Biggest Threat to our Security is Climate Policy

description:
Welcome to episode 14 of the Sceptic! On the show […]

The post In Episode 14 of the Sceptic: Dan Hannan on Lockdowns, the Lords and the Tory Leadership, a 19 Year-Old Quizzed by Police Over Her “Right-Wing Views” and Julian Mann on Persecuted Christians appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: In Episode 14 of the Sceptic: Dan Hannan on Lockdowns, the Lords and the Tory Leadership, a 19 Year-Old Quizzed by Police Over Her “Right-Wing Views” and Julian Mann on Persecuted Christians

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
